homeURL.title: Home page
homeURL.description: URL to open when Chrome starts.

ip.title: IP
ip.description: Chrome developer tools server host. Leave it as it is, change it only if it's necessary.

port.title: Port
port.description: Server's listening port. Change it only if it conflicts with any other service running in your machine.

appNames.title: Target extension
appNames.description: Name of the extension to reload every time you save changes.

refreshAll.title: Refresh all the tabs
refreshAll.description: **If tab refreshing is avtive**, this will refresh all the tabs.

delay.title: Connection delay
delay.description: Amount of time to wait for the Chrome Browser to start before atemping to connect to it (in sconds).

baseCommand.title: Chrome's execution command
baseCommand.description: Command by which Chrome is executed in the system. Leave it as it is. Don't change it unless it's necessary.
